title: USMCA Nearing a Deal, Investing in Europe, The Amazon Management System
itunes:title: USMCA Nearing a Deal, Investing in Europe, The Amazon Management System
description:
Bloomberg News U.S. Economic Policy Team Leader Sarah McGregor and Stefan Selig, Managing Partner at BridgePark Advisors, discuss USMCA and a potential delay in December trade tariffs. David Marcus, CEO at Evermore Global, talks about why now is the time to invest in Europe. Ram Charan, Author of The Amazon Management System, walks through the inside secrets of the ultimate digital business engine. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Projects & Investigations Reporter Peter Waldman share insight on mistrust and the hunt for spies among Chinese Americans. And we Drive to the Close with Tom Plumb, Portfolio Manager at Plumb Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.
